backend/main.mo: Actor defines message handling, user profiles, FAQ suggestions, and anonymized learning signals with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels for the project’s feature evidence report.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence descriptions of various frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with RTL-friendly base rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with Persian language and RTL direction settings pointing to the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, navigation, and themed rendering of main pages.
Empty placeholder file for an admin-guard component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminUnlock: Empty placeholder file for an admin unlock dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Unauthenticated landing screen providing Persian UI text and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity sessions and React Query cache behavior.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile with Persian UI text.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Header displaying app branding, Persian tagline, optional user greeting, and login button.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Provides a message input with send button handling async sending, disabled states, and enter-to-send behavior.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders chat messages with user/mama detection, timestamp formatting, and directional styling based on author.
frontend/src/components/chat/HeartbeatPi: Displays pipeline processing steps with status icons, failure state, and optional dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/chat/PrivacyPres: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/external-knowled: Fetches and displays Wikipedia summaries with loading, error handling, and external link support.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, background styling, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Determines actor readiness state based on authentication and fetch status, exposing derived flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login/clear logic, loading stored identities and managing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, messages, sending messages, and FAQ operations using actor-based backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWikipediaSummary.t: Implements a query hook that searches Wikipedia and returns a page summary for a given search term.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for dark and light themes with detailed color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/mamaAngles.ts: Generates deterministic response angle candidates based on message features and selects primary angles with anti-repetition.
frontend/src/lib/mamaBrain.ts: Creates empathetic or FAQ-based Mama responses using deterministic template selection and Persian text normalization.
frontend/src/lib/mamaDepthTemplates.ts: Provides structured deep-response templates for each angle type and generates detailed responses deterministically.
frontend/src/lib/mamaPipeline.ts: Runs a deterministic 7‑step pipeline to process user messages with keyboard correction, FAQ search, emotional analysis, angle/depth selection, and response generation.
frontend/src/lib/mamaSelectionBias.ts: Computes angle-selection bias from aggregate stats and applies weighted adjustments to candidate priorities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFaqImportP: Empty placeholder page for FAQ import functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFaqSuggest: Empty placeholder page for FAQ suggestion management.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the chat UI and message flow, invoking the Mama pipeline and managing authentication, queries, and feedback state.
frontend/src/pages/MamaBrainPage.tsx: Displays a descriptive overview of the Mama system’s architecture and modules with styled UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/TransparencyPage.tsx: Shows live transparency metrics, public messages, and aggregate stats with periodic auto-refresh.
frontend/src/utils/chatErrors.ts: Provides structured error classification, user-friendly messages, and sanitized debug logging.
frontend/src/utils/perf.ts: Development-only performance timers for measuring async and sync function durations without exposing user content.
frontend/src/utils/persianKeyboardCorrec: Provides heuristics to detect Persian text typed on an English keyboard and converts characters using an English‑to‑Persian mapping.
frontend/src/utils/persianText.ts: Normalizes Persian text spacing and punctuation, enforces the ماما prefix, and sanitizes prompts for safe metadata storage.
frontend/src/utils/privacyPreservingSign: Generates anonymized, non‑reversible learning signals from normalized messages using keyword‑based categories and length/question metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for extracting, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, features, and pending requests related to automatic angle expansion and self‑improving Mama responses.
